Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: params
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: init()
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: initialize

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: ablockByHeight(height:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve administrative blocks for any given height.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: ack(hash:chainId:fullTransaction:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: This Method is used to find the status of a transaction, whether it be a factoid, reveal entry, or commit entry.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: adminBlock(keymr:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a specified admin block given its merkle root key.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: anchors(hash:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve information about the directory block anchors that have been confirmed on Bitcoin and Ethereum.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: chainHead(chainId:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Return the keymr of the head of the chain for a chain ID (the unique hash created when the chain was created).

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: commitChain(message:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Send a Chain Commit Message to factomd to create a new Chain.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: commitEntry(message:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Send an Entry Commit Message to factom to create a new Entry.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: currentTime(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: The current-minute API call returns:

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: dBlockByHeight(height:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieves a directory block given only its height.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: diagnostics(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve basic system information along with a description of the nodeâ€™s current perception of the network.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: directoryBlock(keymr:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Every directory block has a KeyMR (Key Merkle Root), which can be used to retrieve it.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: directoryBlockHead(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: The directory block head is the last known directory block by factom, or in other words, the most recently recorded block.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: ecBlockByHeight(height:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve the entry credit block for any given height. These blocks contain entry credit transaction information.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: entry(hash:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Get an Entry from factomd specified by the Entry Hash.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: entryAck(txid:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Entry Acknowledgements will give the current status of a transaction.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: entryBlock(keymr:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a specified entry block given its merkle root key. The entry block contains 0 to many entries

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: entryCreditBalance(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Return its current balance for a specific entry credit address.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: ebtryCreditBlock(keymr:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a specified entrycredit block given its merkle root key. The numbers are minute markers.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: entryCreditRate(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Returns the number of Factoshis (Factoids *10^-8) that purchase a single Entry Credit.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: factoidAck(txid:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Factoid Acknowledgements will give the current status of a transaction.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: factoidBalance(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: This method returns the number of Factoshis (Factoids *10^-8) that are currently available at the address specified.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: factoidBlock(keymr:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a specified factoid block given its merkle root key.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: factoidSubmit(transaction:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a specified factoid block given its merkle root key.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: fBlockByHeight(height:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve the factoid block for any given height. These blocks contain factoid transaction information.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: heights(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Returns various heights that allows you to view the state of the blockchain. The heights returned provide a lot of information regarding the state of factomd, but not all are needed by most applications.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: multipleEcBalances(addresses:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: The multiple-ec-balances API is used to query the acknowledged and saved balances for a list of entry credit addresses.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: multipleFctBalances(addresses:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: The multiple-fct-balances API is used to query the acknowledged and saved balances in factoshis (a factoshi is 10^8 factoids) not factoids(FCT) for a list of FCT addresses.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: pendingEntries(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Returns an array of the entries that have been submitted but have not been recorded into the blockchain.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: pendingTransactions(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Returns an array of factoid transactions that have not yet been recorded in the blockchain, but are known to the system.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: properties(completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve current properties of the Factom system, including the software and the API versions.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: rawData(hash:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve an entry or transaction in raw format, the data is a hex encoded string.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: receipt(hash:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve a receipt providing cryptographically verifiable proof that information was recorded in the factom blockchain and that this was subsequently anchored in the bitcoin blockchain.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: revialChain(entry:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Reveal the First Entry in a Chain to factomd after the Commit to complete the Chain creation.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: revealEntry(entry:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Reveal an Entry to factomd after the Commit to complete the Entry creation.

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: sendRawMessageToCheckCommit(message:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: sendRawMessageToCheckCommit

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: sendRawMessageToCheckRevealChain(message:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: sendRawMessageToCheckRevealChain

Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.name: transaction(hash:completion:)
Classes/FactomdService.html#/s:13factoms.abstract: Retrieve details of a factoid transaction using a transactionâ€™s hash (or corresponding transaction id).

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: params
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: init()
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: initializer

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: activeIdentityKeys(chainId:height:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This method will return an identityâ€™s set of public keys (in order of decreasing priority) that were active at a specific block, or at the most recent height if the height parameter is not included.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: addEcOutput(txName:address:amount:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Method is used to add entry credit outputs

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: addFee(txName:address:amount:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Addfee is a shortcut and safeguard for adding the required additional factoshis to covert the fee.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: addInput(txName:address:amount:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Adds an input to the transaction from the given address.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: addOutput(txName:address:amount:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Adds a factoid address output to the transaction.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: address(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Retrieve the public and private parts of a Factoid or Entry Credit address stored in the wallet.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: allAddress(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Retrieve all of the Factoid and Entry Credit addresses stored in the wallet.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: allIdentityKeys(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Returns all of the identity key pairs that are currently stored in the wallet. If the wallet is encrypted, it must be unlocked prior to using this method.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeChain(extids:content:ecpub:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This method, compose-chain, will return the appropriate API calls to create a chain in factom. You must first call the commit-chain, then the reveal-chain API calls. To be safe, wait a few seconds after calling commit.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeEntry(chainId:extids:content:ecpub:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This method, compose-entry, will return the appropriate API calls to create an entry in factom.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeIdentityAttribute(receiverChainId:destinationChainId:attributes:signerKey:signerChainId:ecpub:force:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This request allows one identity to state an attribute about another identity and publish that entry to any existing chain. An attribute is a set of generic key:value pairs that can be assigned to an identity and is flexible enough to accommodate many different use-cases. In the example request, an identity is giving itself an attribute describing its current email address, and writing that entry to its own identity chain.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeIdentityAttributeEndorsement(destinationChainId:entryHash:signerKey:signerChainId:ecpub:force:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This method helps you endorse an attribute that has already been registered on the Factom blockchain. To do this, youâ€™ll need to create a structured entry on to the Identity chain. The compose-identity-attribute-endorsement method will return the API calls needed to create that entry. If the wallet is encrypted, it must be unlocked prior to using this command.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeIdentityChain(names:pubkeys:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: The compose-identity-chain method will return the appropriate API calls to create an identity chain in factom. The chain will be constructed based on the name and public keys that you send in the request. The response you receive is similar to the compose-chain response.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeIdentityKeyReplacement(chainId:oldkey:newkey:signerkey:ecpub:force:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Replacing one of an identityâ€™s keys is done by adding a structured entry onto the identityâ€™s chain. This will need to be done if you feel that a key was compromised or has been in use for too long.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: composeTransaction(txName:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Compose transaction marshals the transaction into a hex encoded string.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: deleteTransaction(txName:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Deletes a working transaction in the wallet. The full transaction will be returned, and then deleted.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: generateEcAddress(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Create a new Entry Credit Address and store it in the wallet.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: generateFactoidAddress(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Create a new Entry Credit Address and store it in the wallet.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: generateIdentityKey(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Creates a new identity key and adds it to the wallet.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: getHeight(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Get the current hight of blocks that have been cached by the wallet while syncing.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: identityKey(publicKey:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Given an identity public key as input, this method will respond with the corresponding public/private key pair from the wallet.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: importAddress(addresses:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Import Factoid and/or Entry Credit address secret keys into the wallet.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: importIdentityKeys(keys:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Allows a user to add one or more identity keys to the wallet. Using the secret keys as input, the command will return the corresponding key pairs that were imported.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: importKoinify(words:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Import a Koinify crowd sale address into the wallet.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: newTransaction(txName:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This will create a new transaction.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: properties(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Retrieve current properties of factom-walletd, including the wallet and wallet API versions.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: removeAddress(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Be careful using this function! Ensure that you have backups of important keys before removing them. Given a factoid or entry-credit address, this command deletes the corresponding key pair from the wallet. Once executed, the user will no longer be able to retrieve the private key or make transactions with the address from this wallet.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: removeIdentityKey(publicKey:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Be careful using this function! Ensure that you have backups of important keys before removing them. Given an identity public key, this command deletes the corresponding identity key pair from the wallet. Once executed, the user will no longer be able to retrieve that key pair or sign attributes/endorsements with the key pair from this wallet.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: signData(signer:data:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Sign arbitrary data using a secret key stored in the wallet using ed25519 signatures. signer can be a human readable Factoid Address (FA), Entry Credit Address (EC), or Identity Key (idpub). data is a base64-encoded string

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: signTransaction(txName:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Signs the transaction. It is now ready to be executed.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: subFee(txName:address:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Using sub fee, you can use the receiving address in the parameters, and the fee will be deducted from their output amount.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: tempTransactions(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Lists all the current working transactions in the wallet. These are transactions that are not yet sent

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: transactionUsingRange(start:end:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This will retrieve all transactions within a given block height range.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: transactionById(txId:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: This will retrieve a transaction by the given TxID.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: transactionByAddress(address:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Retrieves all transactions that involve a particular address

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: allTransactions(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Retrieves all transactions

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: unlockWallet(passPhrase:timeout:completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Unlocks this wallet for the amount of time specified in seconds by timeout. The

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: walletBackup(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: Return the wallet seed and all addresses in the wallet for backup and offline storage.â€Œ

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: walletBalances(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: The wallet-balances API is used to query the acknowledged and saved balances for all addresses in the currently running factom-walletd.

Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.name: errors(completion:)
Classes/FactomWalletdService.html#/s:13f.abstract: show the error type and error code

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: holdingQueue(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Shows current holding messages in the queue.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: networkingInfo(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get information on the current network factomd is connected to (TEST, MAIN, etc).

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: predictiveFer(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get the predicted future entry credit rate.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: auditServers(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get a list of the current network audit servers along with their information.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: federatedServers(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get a list of the current network federated servers along with their information.

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: configurationService(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get the current configuration state from factomd.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: processList(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get the process list known to the current factomd instance.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: authorites(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: List of authority servers in the management chain.

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: reloadConfiguration(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Causes factomd to re-read the configuration from the config file.

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: dropRate(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get the current package drop rate for network testing.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: setDropRate(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Change the network drop rate for testing.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: delay(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get the current msg delay time for network testing

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: setDelay(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Set the current msg delay time for network testing.â€Œ

Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.name: messages(completion:)
Classes/DebugService.html#/s:13factoms_s.abstract: Get a list of messages from the message journal

Classes/ApiManager.html#/s:13factoms_swi.name: httpRequest(urlString:params:completion:)
Classes/ApiManager.html#/s:13factoms_swi.abstract: This function is for making request to the server

Classes/ApiManager.html#/s:13factoms_swi.name: isConnectedToInternet()
Classes/ApiManager.html#/s:13factoms_swi.abstract: Call the below function to check the internet connection

Classes/ApiManager.html.name: ApiManager
Classes/ApiManager.html.abstract: Base class for requesting the API’s from the server

Classes/DebugService.html.name: DebugService
Classes/DebugService.html.abstract: These API calls are primarily for debugging purposes.

Classes/FactomdService.html.name: FactomdService
Classes/FactomdService.html.abstract: The API is designed for outside application to process transactions and interact with the Factom federated servers.
